title: Ruthless Kings
description: In a world filled with secrets, lies, and cruelty, only the strongest will survive. Iâ€™m living proof of that. But being left for dead has made me question everything I thought I knew. I want to believe I have allies in these ruthless games, but the more truths I unravel, the more twisted and tangled the web becomes. And the deeper I fall down the rabbit hole, the more determined I am to bring them down. *RUTHLESS KINGS is book 2 in the Windsor Academy series and cannot be read as a standalone. It is a dark high school MF bully romance that may contain triggers for sensitive readers. Due to mature content, it is recommended for readers 17+ only.
author: Laura    Lee
